name: NSMediaLibraryBrowserController
desc: An object that configures and displays a Media Library Browser panel.

items.name: class var shared: NSMediaLibraryBrowserController
items.desc: Returns the shared Media Library Browser instance.

items.name: var frame: NSRect
items.desc: The frame, in global coordinates, used to display the Media Library Browser panel.

items.name: func togglePanel(Any?)
items.desc: Toggles the visibility of the Media Library Browser.

items.name: var isVisible: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that determines whether the Media Library Browser panel is visible.

items.name: var mediaLibraries: NSMediaLibraryBrowserController.Library
items.desc: The media library that is in use.

items.name: struct NSMediaLibraryBrowserController.Library
items.desc: These constants are masks used to configure a Media Library Browser to display specific types of media. Combined masks are not yet supported. In other words, only one nonzero mask value is supported at a time. If masks are combined, the lowest mask value is used.
